title: Mame Artwork 0.144 Special Edition Update
description:
**********************************************************************************
                M.A.M.E.Artwork.v0.144.Special.Edition.Update.Pack
**********************************************************************************

		   Artwork tested with MameUI64 v0.144 x64.          

		Thanks goes out to ALL M.A.M.E. teams...you guys rock!

				-GivingBack-

**********************************************************************************
                              General Information
**********************************************************************************

M.A.M.E. Artwork Special Edition is a collection of the Artwork, Artwork 
Preview, Bosses, Cabinets, Control Panels, Flyers, Game Over, How To, Icons, 
Logo, Manuals, Marquees, PCBs, Samples, Scores, Select, Snaps, Titles & Versus. 
It also includes official & unofficial INI and DAT files. I created this to 
get the best experience possible out of MameUI. I welcome any suggestions, 
comments or complaints that will help me create a better release. 

Type.................: Emulation (Mame-MameUI32/64-IV/Play)
Platform.............: MS Windows 98SE/ME/2000/2003/XP/XPx64/Vista/Vistax64/
				  Win7/Win7x64

**********************************************************************************
                               Post Information:
**********************************************************************************

Posted by............: -GivingBack-
Website..............: http://mameartwork.50megs.com/
Posted to............: alt.binaries.emulators.mame
News Server..........: http://www.news.astraweb.com/
Parts per Day........: ALL
File Count:..........: 119 Files, 46 Folders
Size on Disk.........: 909 MB (953,667,584 bytes)

Files were rebuilt with ClrmamePro v4.01 x64 on: 11/21/11
                                                            
**********************************************************************************
				ARTWORK FILE COUNT:
**********************************************************************************

Artwork: 		FILES: 77 		(10/31/11)	54.9 MB
Artwork Preview:	FILES: 103 		(v0.144)	14.1 MB

Logo:			FILES: 43  		(v0.144)	364  KB

Pcb:			FILES: 65 		(v0.144)	59.5 MB

Scores:			FILES: 58 		(v0.144)	1.09 MB
Select:			FILES: 52 		(v0.144)	2.25 MB
Snaps (In Game): 	FILES: 9307 		(v0.144)	72.6 MB
Titles: 		FILES: 9308 		(v0.144)	67.7 MB
Versus:			FILES: 3  		(v0.144)	76   KB

**********************************************************************************
				DAT VERSION:
**********************************************************************************

Highscore: 		11/02/11 (Unofficial)
History: 		v1.44    (Official)
Mameinfo: 		v0.144   (Official)

**********************************************************************************
				INI VERSION:
**********************************************************************************

Artwork:		10/23/11 (Official)
Catlist32:		v0.143u4 (Unofficial)
Catlist32 Deluxe:	v0.143u4 (Unofficial)
Mame32 INI Files:       v0.144   (Official)
Nplayers32:		v0.144	 (Official)

**********************************************************************************
                                 Release Notes:
**********************************************************************************

11/21/11

-THIS v0.144 UPDATE PACK IS A TEST RELEASE. The update pack was created because of 
requests by the community to elimiate the need to download a full version with 
every new version of M.A.M.E.

-The update pack will require Mame.Artwork.v0.143.Special.Edition.Read.NFO in order 
to build a complete release.

-Individual zip files will continue to be torrent zipped.

-Because Mame.Artwork.v0.143.Special.Edition.Read.NFO & 
Mame.Artwork.v0.144.Special.Edition.Update.Pack are torrent zipped my suggestion is 
to use a program like ClrMamePro to rebuild the zips. This will combine both releases 
into one. 
Or you could uncompress all the files into the same directory, let it 
rename duplicates instead of overwriting them and scan(not rebuild) them with 
ClrMamePro. The dat files for this are in the "dats" directory of the root folder.

-The full version of 0.144 will be not be released along side this update pack.

07/15/11

-These releases will resume posting on newsgroups but files will be torrent zipped
for those who want to seed. I will no longer be seeding myself.

-A solution for update packs is in progress that will be released along side the
full versions.

-Arcade.zip which is located in the manuals directory is not torrent zip. The 
maximum size allowed is 2GB and this archive is 3.53GB. This is the only file not 
torrent zipped at this time.
 <a href="
http://sourceforge.net/projects/trrntzip/forums/forum/457469/topic/1326649" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://sourceforge.net/projects/trrntzip/forums/forum/457469/topic/1326649</a>


01/10/11

-Added all new artwork. Updates included: Artwork Preview, Bosses, Cabinets, 
Flyers, Game Over, How To, Logo, Manuals, Marquees, PCB, Scores, Select, Snap, 
Titles & Versus


12/18/09

-All Artwork is complete.

08/14/09

-Cheat.zip has been moved back to the root directory.

Titles are missing 4 at this time. They are:

missing rom: ampkr2b4.png [size: 2018] [CRC32: e0552e57] [MD5: bc6aab059bd08fd8e4f68ff631d1b7ea] [SHA1: 892d8578781112346d696a7c2f67b9ad769494fb]
missing rom: atlantol.png [size: 3975] [CRC32: 365731fc] [MD5: d47ae3cd33cf1f37c6ab449c7363ac4d] [SHA1: 84625c5354d1a6a3c6ebb03099e96d6f68ffc7b2]
missing rom: battlan3.png [size: 7818] [CRC32: c329098c] [MD5: 3b3c1ed715d543914afb69506e2903bb] [SHA1: 9b22e15996fab9a565cb68e9144668ffdfa2ad30]
missing rom: m_cpeno1.png [size: 1403] [CRC32: 51e0e712] [MD5: 18577827eb64ab949790702e4f5f0d91] [SHA1: 8c72daca9f961c853ff6f36b5a061235b1fcc3b3]

01/08/09

-I have included an additional directory called "cheat". This contains a more up 
to date unofficial cheat source v0.127 (10/19/08 v8). It has been left compressed 
in this directory. PLEASE READ it's instructions before you use it. The "cheat.zip" 
in the archive is to remain compressed.

-It appears that the Version & Version 0.53-0.126 folder list contain duplicate 
data. Since Version contains data from build v0.001 to present that INI file will 
remain and Version 0.53-0.126.ini will be removed. If this information is incorrect 
please let me know and it will be included in the next release.

07/11/08

-Bosco.zip for the artwork directory was the correct version. The previous DAT file
dated 02/12/08 was not updated at the time of it's release per Mr. Do's website.

05/09/08

-Cleaned up the docs directory.

-Added a dats directory. These are the dats used to build this artwork pack.

-There is a new version of bosco.zip for the artwork directory that is not 
included in this release. The new file may not be available:

Bosconian (new version) [folder: bosco - size: 77kb]
missing rom: bosconian_bezel.png [size: 78296] [CRC32: 17ce424f] [SHA1: 38fef2796b57e79652a7b3164b81ba80368c67c3]

10/19/07

-Added PBC image files.

09/17/07

-Added Shoegazer's Rankings.ini.

08/07/07

-Added Mr. Do's Artwork.ini.

06/14/07 

-Mamu's icons will now replace JohnIV's icons. These files will be 
uncompressed in the icons directory.

05/08/07 

-Version.ini from Mame32 INI is not included becasue it contains the same
info as Version.ini from catlist32.

**********************************************************************************
                                Install Notes:
**********************************************************************************

Extract RAR archives into a directory of your choice. Place your Mame build 
                   into the same directory. Run Mame & enjoy!
